content: earth mama leg warmers were inspired by my dear friend eve who is the quintessential embodiment of an earth goddess spendinging her days on her organic farm tending the various plants and lovingly raising animals these le gwarmers were created to keep legs warm while working with the damp earth of spring but they are perfect for year- round pairing nicely with everything from work boots to heels wear them pulled up for warmth or slouched for a trendy look the ribbing and fared ankle cufs make them hug the legs while ftting most shapes and sizes repeats of the pattern allows to
